title: FS / FT - VIC WILLIS FREAK!!! rare front miscut
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: FS / FT - VIC WILLIS FREAK!!! rare front miscut
posts.post_content:
Hello all!

I really hate to part with this.....but I need a drum back for my run and I can't afford one:o..so I must sell or trade this beauty!!(scan to follow)...

A NEVER seen 2 player front side to side miscut of HOFER Willis  showing part of another player!

these cards are UNHEARD OF and never found on T206......usually the miscut is top to bottom on T206, not side to side......if they are found side to side miscut, it is usually very slight.....

this willis offering has a significant enough miscut to identify the player next to willis on the sheet.....

it is sgc graded a 2 and a factory cut error(not a scrap)........

I have never seen another T206 miscut like this.....this is extremely unique....

I am only willing to trade for drum (lower condition is fine).......or have a price on this card in the 4- $3500 range..........HELP ME GET DRUM!:D  I will only sell or trade this card for a T206 drum example....email me and let's chat...

EMAIL PREFFERED.....scans to follow shortly


thanks

Johnny

Beautiful card Johnny, I believe its Wilhelm

Thanks my friend:).....I can never get the scans to fit:o  chris for always figuring this shit out!

As you can see guys, try to find another one like this, YOU CAN'T:D
Great card I wish I had the trade bait available.
